data.lyric:
[ti:Confessions of a Dangerous Mind (Explicit)]
[ar:Logic]
[al:Confessions of a Dangerous Mind (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Confessions of a Dangerous Mind - LOGiC
[00:12.84]Lyrics by：Sir Robert Bryson Hall II/Arjun Ivatury
[00:25.69]Composed by：Sir Robert Bryson Hall II/Arjun Ivatury
[00:38.54]Yeah, I can't get no better, can't get no more cheddar
[00:41.78]I feel like a king and my queen is Coretta
[00:43.49]I been made a livin', I'm never gon' give in
[00:45.31]I'm just way too driven, that's why I been thinkin'
[00:46.87]I'm scared that I'm sinkin', I'm scared that I'm fallin'
[00:48.44]The world think I'm ballin' and maybe I am
[00:50.22]But don't give a d**n, back in the beginnin'
[00:51.66]Did not have a plan, don't know who I am
[00:53.58]Or who I'm becomin' but I'ma do me to the fullest, alright
[00:56.10]Bustin' and dodgin' them bullets all night
[00:57.80]Take over the world, yeah I'm thinkin' I might
[00:59.23]Got 'em all in my sight
[01:00.29]I know that I'm strong, I know that I am
[01:01.96]I know I'm the man
[01:02.82]And whether you poor or you filled with financial security
[01:05.20]Everyone deal with they own insecurity
[01:06.73]Even the preacher was born with impurity
[01:08.44]Scared to go out even with my security
[01:10.02]Scared of the world and all of its obscurity
[01:11.69]Pray for maturity, hope that I grow
[01:13.47]Hope my anxiety stay on the low
[01:15.10]I swear I hope that s**t don't f**k up my flow
[01:16.92]Where do I go? What would you do
[01:18.57]If suddenly all of your dreams came true?
[01:20.21]What would you do if you did it all? (If you did it all)
[01:22.85]If you ain't never have to lift a finger
[01:24.34]Would you linger like, "F**k 'em all"?
[01:25.56]Guess it's your call, but I can't (It's your call, but I can't)
[01:27.98]This a marathon, not a sprint
[01:29.51]Switch up the plan like homie that went from Verizon to Sprint
[01:31.71]Can you hear me now? Does anybody out there feel me now?
[01:34.67]What's your name? What's your game?
[01:36.20]Come now boy, just spit your flow
[01:38.04]Feel the pain with the game, what you tryna say though?
[01:41.39]Novocaine to the brain, I can't feel nothing no more
[01:44.72]In my lane, can't refrain from lettin' these people know
[01:48.17]What's your name? What's your game?
[01:49.84]Come now boy, just spit your flow
[01:51.61]Feel the pain with the game, what you tryna say though?
[01:54.88]Novocaine to the brain, I can't feel nothing no more
[01:58.29]In my lane, can't refrain from lettin' these people know
[02:02.50]How I feel (How I feel), yeah that's how I feel (That's how I feel)
[02:05.49]Break it down, roll it up, that's how high I feel (That's how high I feel)
[02:09.22]How I feel (How I feel), how high I feel (How high I feel)
[02:12.54]Down, roll it up, yeah
[02:15.25]Searchin' for bliss only led me to searchin' for hits
[02:17.06]Only led me to battle depression
[02:18.61]I don't learn my lesson 'cause fame never lessen the pain
[02:20.74]What if your life was under a glass?
[02:22.26]And people tried to dig up s**t from your past
[02:24.04]And tell you what's good and what's not
[02:25.41]And every time you drop a song, they say that it's wack or it's hot
[02:27.90]And don't give a d**n that it came from the heart
[02:29.69]They tear it apart like hyenas that's here for the dreamers
[02:31.48]That's here for the people that know what I'm sayin'
[02:33.21]All of the people that know what I'm sayin'
[02:35.12]F**k social media
[02:35.85]Tellin' me who I should be and just how I should rap
[02:37.88]They always compare, they always compare me to others
[02:39.96]And try to pit me up against all my brothers
[02:41.74]Now why you think so many rappers be overdosin' at the crib?
[02:43.99](Overdosin' at the crib)
[02:44.83]'Cause people just won't let 'em live
[02:46.12]And the public is constantly thinkin' they know 'em
[02:47.74]But nobody knowin' what's goin' on inside (On inside)
[02:50.67]And they wonder why we all hide, s**t
[02:52.56]Maybe I'm just overthinkin'
[02:53.45]Or maybe I'm just over smokin' and drinkin'
[02:55.00]And when I can't deal with the hate, I self-medicate
[02:56.92]Sit in the corner and think of a better day
[02:58.59]Maybe this bullet can help me to get away
[03:00.31]I just cannot seem to think of a better way
[03:02.08]Even though I know there is, that's why I keep goin'
[03:04.07]That's why I keep flowin', that's why I keep perserverin'
[03:06.23]Even when I'm hearin' I'm a b***h, I'm a fag
[03:08.10]I'm a motherf**kin' hypebeast, I ain't black in the slight least
[03:10.25]I ain't good enough, I should quit, I should kill myself (Kill myself)
[03:14.03]"'Cause you'll never be Kenny"
[03:15.11]"You'll never be better than Drizzy or Cole"
[03:16.73]"You're losing your hair, you're too f**king old," yeah
[03:19.37]These are the comments I'm readin' on Twitter right now
[03:21.27]They make me depressed and they pullin' me down
[03:23.11]I'm tryin' to swim but I think I might drown
[03:24.91]So I'ma turn that feelin' into a sound
[03:26.38]And play it when nobody else is around
[03:28.03]Whenever I feel like I'm far from the ground
[03:29.83]God gave me the power to battle depression
[03:31.43]Yeah round after round
[03:32.42]I wish I was famous, I wish I was rich
[03:34.36]I wish I could just get up out of this b***h
[03:36.26]But be careful what you wish for (What you wish for)
[03:39.38]'Cause it ain't everything that it's cut out to be
[03:41.01]My life is good but not as good as it's boutta be
[03:42.90]'Cause I got vision, don't f**k with division
[03:44.14]Ain't God, but I'm rich and I think that I am
[03:46.11]Do what you love and do not give a d**n
[03:47.81]Fuck all the haters you see on the 'Gram
[03:49.34]Just mind your own business and be a good man
[03:51.16]Be a good boss and be a good friend
[03:52.72]Spread your imaginations to the millions
[03:54.32]Don't worry 'bout how to maintain all your millions
[03:56.09]Just spread that positivity for the children
[03:57.69]And all the haters that's hatin', just love 'em
[03:59.35]'Cause that's the only way you ever gon' kill 'em
[04:01.03]Know some of you feelin' (Know some of you feelin')
[04:02.64]Last but not least, put your ego on the shelf
[04:05.44]And remember, love yourself (Love yourself)
[04:09.74]Oh nah, nah (Oh, nah, nah)
[04:11.24]Put your ego on the shelf and love yourself (Love yourself)
[04:14.75]Nah, nah, nah (Nah, nah, nah)
[04:16.40]Put your ego on the shelf, and remember, love your
[04:19.41]'Member, love yourself
[04:35.75]Oh nah, nah
[04:36.71]Put your ego on the shelf and love yourself
[04:40.02]Nah, nah, nah
data.trans:
[ti:Confessions of a Dangerous Mind (Explicit)]
[ar:Logic]
[al:Confessions of a Dangerous Mind (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:12.84]//
[00:25.69]//
[00:38.54]我已竭尽全力 没法再多赚钱了
[00:41.78]我感觉我就是国王 我的王后是Coretta
[00:43.49]我一直努力赚钱谋生 我永远不会屈服
[00:45.31]我一直活得很被动 所以我一直在想
[00:46.87]我害怕我会一直堕落下去 再无出头之日
[00:48.44]全世界的人都觉得我花天酒地 也许的确是这样
[00:50.22]但我不在乎 回想当初
[00:51.66]我没有什么规划 也不知道自己是谁
[00:53.58]不知道以后会成为什么样的人 但我会竭尽所能
[00:56.10]没日没夜地逃命
[00:57.80]但我觉得有一天 我会统治整个世界
[00:59.23]让他们都对我俯首称臣
[01:00.29]我知道我很强大 我知道
[01:01.96]我知道我是个真正的男人
[01:02.82]不管你是穷人还是富人
[01:05.20]每个人都缺乏安全感
[01:06.73]即使牧师也会心存杂念
[01:08.44]带着保安我也不敢出门
[01:10.02]害怕有人对我不利 害怕被黑暗吞噬
[01:11.69]祈祷我赶快长大 成熟起来
[01:13.47]希望我能摆脱焦虑感
[01:15.10]当然 这些东西不会影响我的创作水平
[01:16.92]我的未来在哪里 如果是你你会怎么做
[01:18.57]如果有一天你所有的梦想全部实现了呢
[01:20.21]如果你什么都不用做了 你会怎么办
[01:22.85]如果你彻底高忱无忧了呢
[01:24.34]你会不会想 去他们的
[01:25.56]我想这就是你的心声 但我不能像你一样
[01:27.98]人生的路还很长 不能就此止步
[01:29.51]改变计划  Paul Marcarelli的广告也从Verizon换到Sprint
[01:31.71]你能听见我说话吗 有人能明白我的感受吗
[01:34.67]你叫什么名字 说唱水平怎么样
[01:36.20]来吧 小子 有什么本事都使出来
[01:38.04]体会到做说唱歌手的辛苦了吧 还想说什么吗
[01:41.39]大脑已经麻木 我什么感觉都没有了
[01:44.72]这就是我的圈子 忍不住想让这些人知道
[01:48.17]你叫什么名字 说唱水平怎么样
[01:49.84]来吧 小子 有什么本事都使出来
[01:51.61]体会到做说唱歌手的辛苦了吧 还想说什么吗
[01:54.88]大脑已经麻木 我什么感觉都没有了
[01:58.29]这就是我的圈子 忍不住想让这些人知道
[02:02.50]我的感受 没错这就是我的感受
[02:05.49]肆意舞蹈 卷一根** 此刻我就是这么嗨
[02:09.22]此刻我就是这么嗨
[02:12.54]肆意舞蹈 卷一根**
[02:15.25]追求幸福 最后总是和女人混在一起
[02:17.06]和抑郁的情绪作斗争
[02:18.61]我不会吸取教训 因为名气并不能帮我缓解痛苦
[02:20.74]要是你的生活被人监视了呢
[02:22.26]有些人还一直挖你的黑历史
[02:24.04]告诉你什么是好歌 什么是烂歌
[02:25.41]每次你发行一首新歌 就要被别人指指点点
[02:27.90]说实在的 这些评价我都不在乎
[02:29.69]本来是写给有梦想的人的歌 却被一群狼狗糟践了
[02:31.48]这些话说给那些明白我的心情的人
[02:33.21]所有与我感同身受的人
[02:35.12]社交媒体真垃圾
[02:35.85]键盘侠跟我说我该做什么样的人 还教我怎么说唱
[02:37.88]他们总喜欢拿我跟其他人比较
[02:39.96]还要让我和我的好兄弟反目成仇
[02:41.74]现在你知道为什么这么多说唱歌手在家里醉生梦死了吧
[02:43.99]在家里醉生梦死
[02:44.83]因为网友不给我们留活路啊
[02:46.12]大家都以为他们很了解我们
[02:47.74]但没有真正了解过他们的内心
[02:50.67]他们不知道我们为什么要躲躲藏藏
[02:52.56]也许是我想太多了
[02:53.45]也许我就是喝多了 太嗨了
[02:55.00]我没法让他们不恨我 只能调整好自己的心情
[02:56.92]坐在角落里 期待明天会好一点
[02:58.59]或许朝自己开一枪 可以帮我解脱
[03:00.31]我实在找不出更好的办法了
[03:02.08]但我想办法还是有的 所以我还没有放弃
[03:04.07]所以我一直坚持我的说唱事业
[03:06.23]就算听到有人骂我 是个碧池 是同性恋
[03:08.10]是个炒作狂 我一点也不生气
[03:10.25]我做得不够好 我应该放弃 我就不该活着
[03:14.03]因为你永远都无法成为第二个Kendrick Lamar
[03:15.11]你也永远无法超越J. Cole和Drake
[03:16.73]你都开始秃头了 上了年纪了
[03:19.37]这些都是我在Twitter看到的评论
[03:21.27]这些话让我很难过 心情一落千丈
[03:23.11]我想去游泳 但我怕我会被淹死
[03:24.91]所以我把我的心情寄托在音乐里
[03:26.38]在旁边没有人的时候弹奏出来
[03:28.03]每次我感觉很茫然的时候
[03:29.83]上帝赋予了我战胜沮丧的力量
[03:31.43]一次又一次
[03:32.42]我希望我有钱 有名气
[03:34.36]我希望能在质疑声中重新崛起
[03:36.26]但是 千万不要轻易许愿
[03:39.38]因为结果往往事与愿违
[03:41.01]我现在衣食无忧 但我还可以更好
[03:42.90]因为我目光长远 不要误会我的意思
[03:44.14]我不是上帝 不过只要有钱 也是可以成为上帝的
[03:46.11]尽管做自己喜欢做的事情 不要管别人说什么
[03:47.81]不要理Instagram上面那些喷子
[03:49.34]做好自己的事 做个好人
[03:51.16]当大老板 做个靠谱的朋友
[03:52.72]让大家看到你的想象力
[03:54.32]不要去想怎么留住你的百万家财
[03:56.09]给孩子们传播正能量
[03:57.69]对那些怀恨者以德报怨
[03:59.35]因为这样他们才不会再诋毁你
[04:01.03]直面自己内心的感受
[04:02.64]最后一点 放下你的自尊
[04:05.44]记住 要爱惜自己
[04:09.74]//
[04:11.24]放下你的自尊 爱惜自己
[04:14.75]//
[04:16.40]放下你的自尊 爱惜自己
[04:19.41]记住 要爱惜自己
[04:35.75]//
[04:36.71]放下你的自尊 爱惜自己
[04:40.02]//
